title: Fossil fuels are a 'crutch': How AI's unlikely winner could be renewable energy
description: The IEA revised its 2025-2030 growth forecast for renewables downward by 5% compared to 2024, reflecting the changing sentiment and policy.

title: From Ancient Rome To Now, War-Makers Constantly Talk About Peace
description: (MENAFN - Asia Times)In a week filled with news about President Donald Trump's aggressive moves to take control of Greenland, the world got a window into his thinking about the concept ...

title: Three-day Jonbeel Mela with ancient barter system begins at Jagiroad
description: The traditional Jonbeel Mela, featuring the ancient barter system, will be held on Janu-ary 22, 23, and 24 at the Jonbeel Pathar in Jagiroad.

title: The 410 million-year-old fossil found in Scotland which represents 'a new lifeform'
description: The fossil is neither a plant nor fungus - but from its own distinct evolutionary path.

title: Solar and wind overtake fossil fuels in the EU for the first time. Can the power grid keep up?
description: The EU is “rapidly” moving towards a clean energy future, but experts warn our “outdated” grid is holding us back.
